messages.messageBody:
on 1/27/04 12:54 PM, AM Brown at ambdkf@... wrote:

> I got the article to come up on your second post. Thanks! Anna
>

That's funny, because I didn't intend to post it twice. In fact, it was
hours between the time I sent it and when yahoo posted it.

I hope you enjoy the article; the rest of her site is good, too.

Nancy (off to Equine Affaire tomorrow -- 4 days of Horse Conference <g>)

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] the real question/newness (if any) is in themiddle
messages.msgSnippet: Nancy, I can t get this article to come up - any ideas?  I really want to read it.  Last fall I read Mark Rashid s last 2 books and loved them.  There was
messages.messageBody:
Nancy,

I can' t get this article to come up - any ideas? I really want to read
it. Last fall I read Mark Rashid's last 2 books and loved them. There was
such an amazing similarity to his ideas about horses and mine about people
(including children). I have passed it along to many to see if it helped
them make the connection. Anyway, this is a subject I'm really interested
in and would love to read the article you referenced. Thanks. Anna
